desc.text: Learn how to efficiently navigate and select text in the editor.
desc.text_inside: In this series of puzzles you will learn how to efficiently navigate and select text in the editor.

puzzles.subtitle: ArrowKeys
puzzles.explanation: Use the ArrowKeys to navigate the text

puzzles.subtitle: Mod + ArrowKeys
puzzles.explanation: Use the ArrowKeys while holding Ctrl/Cmd to jump word by word. Note the different behavior between `foo-bar` and `foo_bar`

desc.text: Test the limits of multicursor editing

puzzles.title: Push to Path
puzzles.subtitle: medium
puzzles.hint: **Fastest Solution:** duplicate template-line down (5x), multicursor-select all `push` with Ctrl+D, 2x(Left), Ctrl+Shift+Home, 2x(Ctrl+Shift+Right), Ctrl+X, move in multicursormode to `'all'`, Ctrl+D to highlight, Ctrl+V
